bug.author: jonashen
bug.description: Potential lasagne error. <denchmark-code> File "/Users/jonathon/Documents/garage/garage/garage/policies/gaussian_gru_policy.py", line 51, in __init__ output_nonlinearity=output_nonlinearity, File "/Users/jonathon/Documents/garage/garage/garage/core/network.py", line 263, in __init__ b=l_output_flat.b, File "/anaconda2/envs/garage/lib/python3.5/site-packages/lasagne/layers/dense.py", line 78, in __init__ super(DenseLayer, self).__init__(incoming, **kwargs) File "/anaconda2/envs/garage/lib/python3.5/site-packages/lasagne/layers/base.py", line 44, in __init__ if any(d is not None and d <= 0 for d in self.input_shape): File "/anaconda2/envs/garage/lib/python3.5/site-packages/lasagne/layers/base.py", line 44, in <genexpr> if any(d is not None and d <= 0 for d in self.input_shape): TypeError: unorderable types: tuple() <= int() </denchmark-code>
